short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The sports tab is a novel extension designed to bring beautiful sport snapshots to your every day peripheral.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now your first browser page will no longer be a boring search bar but your new extension will bring you the joy of your favourite sport. This browser extension was proudly designed by AEM DAYS LTD. All rights for technology design and content belong to AEM DAYS LTD.

Once installed you are able to customize the background by choosing your preferred image from one of the many options in our image library.

We hope you enjoy using the Sports Tab as much as we have.
